titleStmt.title: A little treatise concerning trial of spirits: taken for the most part our of the works of the R.F. Robert Parsons, of the Societie of Iesus. Whereunto is added a comparison of a true Roman Catholike with a Protestant, wherby may bee discouered the difference of their spirits. With an appendix taken out of a later writer
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A09104 of text S119802 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 19410). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 72 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 35 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: A little treatise concerning trial of spirits: taken for the most part our of the works of the R.F. Robert Parsons, of the Societie of Iesus. Whereunto is added a comparison of a true Roman Catholike with a Protestant, wherby may bee discouered the difference of their spirits. With an appendix taken out of a later writer
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

notesStmt.note: Another issue, enlarged, with cancel title page, of: Parsons, Robert. A little treatise concerning triall of spirits.
Place of publication from and press conjectured by STC.
"A comparison of a true Roman Catholike with a Protestant" and "A speech of Cardinall Baronius placed in the beginning of the second tome of his Annals" have caption title.
Running title reads: The difference betweene a Catholike and Protestant spirit.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
